item.description:
Friday's Schedule at IFFBoston.

RSVP with the names of the films you plan to see, so that folks going to the same movies can organize getting together to share the experience.

Please feel free to post comments regarding any of the films, especially those being shown on another day so that we know what is worth seeing, and what is worth avoiding.

The full schedule for IFF is at
http://iffboston.festivalgenius.com/2012/schedule/week


7:00pm Gregory Crewdson: Brief Encounters- Somerville 2
7:15pm BURN - Somerville  1
7:30pm Love Free Or Die - Somerville 3
7:00pm See Girl Run - Somerville 4
6:45pm Shorts 5: ANIMATION- Somerville 5
7:30pm All Ages: The Boston Hardcore Film- Brattle
9:15pm For Ellen - Somerville 5
9:30pm Shorts 1:  DOCS - Somerville 2
9:45pm Detropia - Somerville 4
10:00pm Headhunters - Somerville 3
10:15pm V/H/S - Brattle Theatre
item.how_to_find_us: RSVP with names of films you plan to attend. Scan the list to Meetup with others attending the same film.
item.name: Independent Film Festival Boston - Friday
